    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3070</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3070</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Literatura. Gestes i cavallers</string>
            <string language="en">Literature. Gests and knights</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur. Gests und Ritter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Littérature. Gests et chevaliers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Literatura. Gests e knights</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Letteratura. Gests e cavalieri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογοτεχνία. Gests και ιππότες</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs interactiu que tracta dels inicis de la prosa en llengua catalana. S'hi estudien els precedents llatins, les cròniques i els grans protagonistes de les narracions: Tristany, Lancelot, Curial, Güelfa i Tirant. Textos de "Les quatre grans cròniques", "Curial e Güelfa" i "Tirant lo Blanc". Activitats d'autoavaluació per a la pràctica dels continguts de la unitat.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive resource on the beginnings of prose in Catalan: Latin precedents, the chronicles and the great literary characters (Tristan, Lancelot, Curial, Güelfa and Tirant). Sample texts from "the four great chronicles", "Curial e Güelfa" and "Tirant lo Blanc". Self-assessment activities are also included for practice.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">personatge</string>
            <string language="en">character</string>
            <string language="es">personaje</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ficció</string>
            <string language="en">fiction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gènere literari</string>
            <string language="en">literary genre</string>
            <string language="es">género literario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història de la literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literary history</string>
            <string language="es">historia de la literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
            <string language="es">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">narració</string>
            <string language="en">narration</string>
            <string language="es">narración</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives Hilfsmittel auf den Anfängen von 
Prosa auf katalanisch: Lateinische Präzedenzfälle, die 
Chroniken und die großen literarischen Zeichen (Tristan, Lancelot, 
Curial, Güelfa und Tirant). Beispieltexte "von den vier großen
Chroniken", "von Curial e Güelfa" und "Tirant niedriges Blanc". 
Selbstbewertung Aktivitäten sind auch für Praxis 
eingeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource interactive sur les débuts de la prose
dans le catalan : Précédents latins, les chroniques et les 
grands caractères littéraires (Tristan, Lancelot, Curial, Güelfa et
Tirant). Textes témoin "des quatre grandes chroniques", de 
"Curial e Güelfa" et "Tirant bas Blanc". Des activités de 
art de l'auto-portrait-assessment sont également incluses pour la pratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso interativo nos começos da prosa no 
catalan: Precedents latin, os chronicles e os caráteres 
literários grandes (Tristan, Lancelot, Curial, Güelfa e Tirant). 
Textos da amostra "dos quatro chronicles grandes", de "Curial e 
Güelfa" e "Tirant Blanc baixo". As atividades do 
self-assessment são incluídas também para a prática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa interattiva sugli inizii di prosa nel 
catalan: Precedenti latini, i chronicles ed i caratteri 
letterari grandi (Tristan, Lancelot, Curial, Güelfa e Tirant). 
Testi del campione "dai quattro chronicles grandi", "da Curial e
Güelfa" e "Tirant Blanc basso". Le attività di valutazione di 
se stesso egualmente sono incluse per pratica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς στις αρχές της 
πεζογραφίας στα καταλανικά: Τα λατινικά προηγούμενα, 
εξιστορούν κατά γράμμα και οι μεγάλοι λογοτεχνικοί χαρακτήρες 
(Tristan, Lancelot, Curial, Gόelfa και Tirant). 
Τα κείμενα δείγματα από "τα τέσσερα μεγάλα εξιστορούν 
κατά γράμμα", "Curial ε Gόelfa" και "Tirant lo 
Blanc". Οι δραστηριότητες αυτοαξιολόγησης 
συμπεριλαμβάνονται επίσης για την πρακτική.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichen</string>
          </keyword>
